projects.name: Harvit
projects.description: Harvit harvests data from different sources (e.g websites, APIs), converts and transforms it.

projects.name: Spoty
projects.description: Spoty is a microservice which provides REST API endpoints to query the current playing track on Spotify.

projects.name: Minion
projects.description: A little minion (i.e microservice) that can be replicated to create more minions.

projects.name: Timestream Travel
projects.description: Timestream Travel is a CLI application to backup time-series data from Amazon Timestream to S3.

projects.name: Mauritius Sea Cables
projects.description: Speedtest CLI application for Mauritius Sea Cables.

projects.name: Gocipe
projects.description: Gocipe is a CLI application to generate full-blown headless Content Management Systems.

projects.name: Deckr
projects.description: Deckr is a REST/gRPC microservice to simulate a deck of cards.
